Ancient Civilizations

Flat Earth theories have been present in various forms across cultures and

time. One of the earliest recorded flat Earth beliefs was found in ancient

Mesopotamia, where the Epic of Gilgamesh (circa 2100 BC) described a flat

earth with a solid dome above it (Gilgamesh Epic). Similarly, ancient Greeks

like Pythagoras and Plato proposed flat Earth models, although they were

later disputed by Aristotle's geocentric model.
